## Making correct information unit scoring slightly less painful

<!-- badges: start -->

<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of this shiny app is to make CIU scoring faster, easier, and more reliable.

You can run the app from R (note, this will automatically install any needed packages).

```{r cars, eval=F}
# not run
library(shiny)
shiny::runGitHub('rbcavanaugh/ciu_analysis', subdir = 'rungithub')
```

Or access it at shinyapps.io: <https://rb-cavanaugh.shinyapps.io/aphasia-ciu/>

### Find information about CIUs:

https://pubs.asha.org/doi/abs/10.1044/jshr.3602.338

https://pubs.asha.org/doi/abs/10.1044/jshr.3702.399
